Episodes.Title: The Tooth Fairy's Tats 2000
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Nancy M. Pimental
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Debi Derryberry
Episodes.Plot: The boys enter the world of organized crime when they realize they can make money from the tooth fairy with other children's teeth.

Episodes.Title: Cartman's Silly Hate Crime 2000
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Debi Derryberry
Episodes.Plot: Cartman is sent to juvenile hall after he throws a rock at a black child.

Episodes.Title: Timmy 2000
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Eliza Schneider
Episodes.Plot: A handicapped boys' arrival in class leads to protest. Meanwhile, the boys are diagnosed with ADD and heavily medicated.

Episodes.Title: Quintuplets 2000
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Eliza Schneider
Episodes.Plot: The Marshes adopt a group of Romanian Quintuplets after they are orphaned in South Park. However, soon the Romanian government demands them back. Meanwhile, Kenny develops a talent for singing.

Episodes.Title: Cartman Joins NAMBLA
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Eliza Schneider
Episodes.Plot: Cartman joins NAMBLA, thinking it will introduce him to more mature friends. Meanwhile, Kenny tries to dispose of his unborn baby brother.

Episodes.Title: Cherokee Hair Tampons
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Eliza Schneider
Episodes.Plot: Kyle needs a kidney transplant, and Cartman is the only suitable donor. Meanwhile, Mr. Garrison writes a novel.

Episodes.Title: Chef Goes Nanners
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Eliza Schneider
Episodes.Plot: Chef protests the racist South Park flag.

Episodes.Title: Something You Can Do with Your Finger
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Milan Agnone
Episodes.Plot: Randy is outraged when Stan and the other boys start a boy band.

Episodes.Title: Do the Handicapped Go to Hell?
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Milan Agnone
Episodes.Plot: The boys become obsessed with religion after a sermon about hell scares them. Meanwhile, Saddam returns to Hell and tries to dispose of Satan's new boyfriend.

Episodes.Title: Probably
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Dian Bachar
Episodes.Plot: Cartman becomes an evangelical preacher when the boys break off from their church. Meanwhile, the feud between Saddam and Chris continues.

Episodes.Title: 4th Grade
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Eliza Schneider
Episodes.Plot: The boys deal with a strict new teacher and experiment with time travel as Mr. Garrison comes to terms with his sexuality.

Episodes.Title: Trapper Keeper
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Isaac Hayes
Episodes.Plot: Cartman's new trapper keeper threatens to assimilate the town unless Kyle and a robot from the future can stop it.

Episodes.Title: Helen Keller! The Musical
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Isaac Hayes
Episodes.Plot: Cartman goes overboard directing a Thanksgiving production of "The Miracle Worker." Meanwhile, Timmy develops a bond with a runt turkey named Gobbles.

Episodes.Title: Pip
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Malcolm McDowell, Trey Parker, Matt Stone
Episodes.Plot: Pip attends boarding school in an adaptation of "Great Expectations."

Episodes.Title: Fat Camp
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Isaac Hayes
Episodes.Plot: Cartman is outraged when he is sent to fat camp by his mother. Meanwhile, Kenny becomes famous for a "Jackass" style TV show.

Episodes.Title: The Wacky Molestation Adventure
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Isaac Hayes
Episodes.Plot: The boys tell the police that their parents molest them and soon there are no adults left in South Park. However, without authority figures, society crumbles.

Episodes.Title: A Very Crappy Christmas
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, David R. Goodman
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Isaac Hayes
Episodes.Plot: When everyone in South Park decides to forgo presents and celebrate a non-materialistic holiday season, the boys try to bring the spirit of commercialism back to Christmas by making an animated film.
